name: Halloween Candy Tracker
description:
Find candy and monsters in your own house with this Augmented Reality tracker!

The Halloween Candy Tracker is a special tracker that can use your device's camera to find candy in your very own house!

You can now find candy in your house, in the library, at the park, or even at the cemetery! But be careful, the monsters are everywhere, and they like candy too!

Play up to 100 levels! The tracker is ready to scan 100 places and find all the candy for you! And if the monsters show up, it can protect you as well! The Candy Tracker is equipped with advanced technology and Augmented Reality. If you find a monster, throw gummy bears at it to scare it away!

This year, don't miss any house in the neighborhood!

Happy Halloween!
